full_sentence: All these daffodils are making me sick with hayfever, the way they pollinate to the open outlets
well, black men have no class. But if you consider what the women are like... I'd say the men don't need any class anyways

full_sentence: Im not so sure bro. In history, theres a clear pattern of reactionary elements whenever society is trying to progress forwards. It appears that "racism" will become primary enemy of all decent human beings. We whites do nothing wrong just state facts and they call us racist.
